basics.name: Khanh-Huyen Bui
basics.label: AI Engineer & Researcher
basics.summary: AI Engineer specializing in multi-agent systems, multimodal generative AI, and material discovery. Published in EMNLP, WACV, and Nature Synthesis. Salutatorian of Computer Science Department at VNU-UET.

work.name: AI Innovation Center (AI1), FPT Software
work.summary: Developing and maintaining multi-agent systems, leveraging orchestration framework and runtime for building and managing long-running and stateful agents.
highlights: Developed and maintained multi-agent systems with orchestration framework
Performed backend integration with automated workflows for scalable systems
Successfully delivered multiple specialized multi-agent systems with high customer satisfaction

work.name: Center for Environmental Intelligence (CEI), VinUniversity
work.summary: Developed methods to automate the process of material discovery. Published in two Q1 journals (IF 20 and 6.8). Advisors: Prof. Dung D. Le and Prof. Tung Nguyen-Dang.
highlights: Published in Nature Synthesis (Q1 Journal, IF: 20.0)
Published in Journal of Science: Advanced Materials and Devices (Q1 Journal, IF: 6.8)
Automated material discovery using AI and high-throughput robotics

work.name: AI Innovation Center (AI1), FPT Software
work.summary: Investigated multimodal generative AI for diverse applications, including text-to-image and LLM-based recommender systems. Published in EMNLP 2024 and WACV 2026. Advisor: Prof. Dung D. Le.
highlights: Published in EMNLP 2024 on experiential policy learning for target-driven recommendation dialogues
Published in WACV 2026 on detecting out-of-distribution objects through class-conditioned inpainting
Resolved ambiguous search queries with hybrid ranking method combining semantic and full-text search

work.name: AI Laboratory/Institute for Artificial Intelligence (UET-IAI)
work.summary: Developed end-to-end system for automated Nuchal Translucency segmentation and measurement. Advisor: Dr. Long Quoc Tran.
highlights: First Prize in AI4VN challenges 2022: Medicine Pill Image Recognition Challenge
Developed end-to-end system for automated medical image analysis

work.name: Data Science and Knowledge Technology Laboratory
work.summary: Constructed Vietnamese multi-label e-commerce dataset and established baselines with traditional statistical ML models and CNN-PhoBERT.
highlights: Published in KSE 2021 on aspect-based sentiment analysis
Achieved around 95% Micro/Macro F1 using Word-Window Locating and Chi-Squared feature selection

education.institution: VNU University of Engineering and Technology
courses: Salutatorian - Ranked 2nd/153 of the Computer Science Department

awards.title: Student with Five Good Merits Certificate - Central Level
awards.summary: Awarded to 85 students nationwide for excellence in: Academics, Ethics, Volunteerism, Physical Fitness, and Integration.

awards.title: First Prize, AI4VN Challenge 2022
awards.summary: Developed a medicine pill image recognition system; selected as best solution among 163 national teams.

awards.title: Second Prize, National Student Physics Olympiad
National Outstanding Female Student in Science and Technology
awards.summary: Awarded to 20 female STEM students nationwide for excellent academic performance.

awards.title: Second Prize, Student Scientific Research Contest
awards.summary: Project: Aspect-oriented Vietnamese e-commerce sentiment analysis

awards.title: UET Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Merit-based scholarship for academic excellence (6 semesters)
